Provo.Utah State Hospital:
The Utah State Hospital (USH) is a mental hospital located in Provo, Utah, United States of America. The current superintendent is Dallas Earnshaw.


== History ==

The Utah State Hospital began as the Territorial Insane Asylum in 1885 at Provo, Utah, with the purpose of housing and treating those considered to be mentally ill and attempting to return them to normal levels of functioning.
